p: Evidently, the current pandemic has also seen progress in the swift adoption of electronic platforms across many countries around the worldâ€”propelling stakeholders into a predominantly digital work mode. Based on information collected from our tracker and our experience when interacting with regulatory authorities, video calls have been used extensively, and even by default, to ensure regular interaction, while the use of the cloud and other online storage tools have been encouraged to store and share documents and information in real-time. Some countries have also opted for online submission of marketing-authorization applications, such as through an email-based or online platform, notably where they have not been previously or extensively used.
